structure_flow: Classic Pop/Rock Structure - Verse/Chorus + Gradual build from verse to chorus
Epic/Cinematic Structure - Full Structure + Soft start, powerful peak
Minimal/Ambient Loop - Simple repetitive cycle + Constant energy
EDM/Electronic Structure - Verse/Chorus + Drop & Rise dynamics
Progressive/Jazz Structure - Complex through-composed + Up and down
Live Performance Style - Traditional structure + Slowly rising energy
Experimental/Free-flowing Structure - Free form + Continuously changing dynamics
Intro-Heavy Structure - Full Structure + Strong start, slowing end
Ballad/Emotional Structure - AABA Pattern + Strong start, slowing end
Modern Pop Hit Structure - Pop Structure (V-C-V-C-B-C) + Verse-to-Chorus build
Classical Structure - Sonata form + Development and recapitulation
Folk Structure - Verse/Refrain + Steady narrative flow
Blues Structure - 12-bar blues + Call and response
Dance Structure - Build/Drop/Breakdown + High energy throughout
